title: Hi, I'm Nithin
description:
A developer who enjoys building apps, games, system tools, and applications.
I work with React Native, MERN stack, Unity, Godot, and low-level C for Linux, always focusing on speed, privacy, and clean architecture.
I love experimenting with physics engines, WebRTC systems, ML models, and steganography tools.
Whether it’s a mobile app, a game, or a Linux utility, I enjoy taking ideas from concept to a polished, working product.
